Text: Yes, this is a different series.
my only questions here are: is this dvdrip or hdtv captures? and why is episode 8 double sized? thanks, and great work!

Is this the Region 1 or the Region 2 DVD release?

(Region 2 has the original uncut versions of episodes 1, 2, and 3--instead of the cut-down versions originally broadcast on BBC and released on the Region 1 DVD set).

Thanx...
